original: 將軍威名在外，今日不比用兵，本王與你<color=#b6f8f4>$leader1</color>獨鬥一決，如何？(選擇拒絕將減少我方士氣值200)
text: The general's prestige is out of the ordinary, today is no better than the use of soldiers, this king and you <color=#b6f8f4>$leader1</color> fight alone, how? (Choose to refuse will reduce our morale by 200)
